properties.title: GHCNd

table:columns.name: YEAR/MONTH/DAY
table:columns.description: 8 character date in YYYYMMDD format (e.g. 19860529 = May 29, 1986).

table:columns.name: ELEMENT
table:columns.description: 4 character indicator of element type.

table:columns.name: DATA VALUE
table:columns.description: 5 character data value for ELEMENT.

table:columns.name: M-FLAG
table:columns.description: 1 character Measurement Flag.

table:columns.name: Q-FLAG
table:columns.description: 1 character Quality Flag.

table:columns.name: S-FLAG
table:columns.description: 1 character Source Flag.

table:columns.name: OBS-TIME
table:columns.description: 4-character time of observation in hour-minute format (i.e. 0700 = 7:00 am).

table:columns.name: ID
table:columns.description: 11 character station identification code.

table:columns.name: LATITUDE
table:columns.description: Latitude of the station (in decimal degrees).

table:columns.name: LONGITUDE
table:columns.description: Longitude of the station (in decimal degrees).

table:columns.name: ELEVATION
table:columns.description: Elevation of the station (in meters, missing = -999.9).

table:columns.name: STATE
table:columns.description: U.S. postal code for the state (for U.S. stations only).

table:columns.name: NAME
table:columns.description: The name of the station.

table:columns.name: GSN FLAG
table:columns.description: A flag that indicates whether the station is part of the GCOS Surface Network (GSN).

table:columns.name: HCN/CRN FLAT
table:columns.description: A flag that indicates whether the station is part of the U.S. Historical Climatology Network (HCN) or U.S. Climate Refererence Network (CRN).

table:columns.name: WMO ID
table:columns.description: the World Meteorological Organization (WMO) number for the station. If the station has no WMO number (or one has not yet been matched to this station), then the field is blank.

properties.sci:citation: Menne, Matthew J., Imke Durre, Bryant Korzeniewski, Shelley McNeal, Kristy Thomas, Xungang Yin, Steven Anthony, Ron Ray, Russell S. Vose, Byron E.Gleason, and Tamara G. Houston (2012): Global Historical Climatology Network - Daily (GHCN-Daily), Version 3. NOAA National Climatic Data Center. doi:10.7289/V5D21VHZ
properties.proj:wkt2: GEOGCRS["WGS 84",ENSEMBLE["World Geodetic System 1984 ensemble",MEMBER["World Geodetic System 1984 (Transit)"],MEMBER["World Geodetic System 1984 (G730)"],MEMBER["World Geodetic System 1984 (G873)"],MEMBER["World Geodetic System 1984 (G1150)"],MEMBER["World Geodetic System 1984 (G1674)"],MEMBER["World Geodetic System 1984 (G1762)"],ELLIPSOID["WGS 84",6378137,298.257223563,LENGTHUNIT["metre",1]],ENSEMBLEACCURACY[2.0]],PRIMEM["Greenwich",0,ANGLEUNIT["degree",0.0174532925199433]],CS[ellipsoidal,2],AXIS["geodetic latitude (Lat)",north,ORDER[1],ANGLEUNIT["degree",0.0174532925199433]],AXIS["geodetic longitude (Lon)",east,ORDER[2],ANGLEUNIT["degree",0.0174532925199433]],USAGE[SCOPE["Horizontal component of 3D system."],AREA["World."],BBOX[-90,-180,90,180]],ID["EPSG",4326]]
